scripts.install:backend: cd apps/backend && test -f package.json && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd apps/frontend && test -f package.json && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd apps/frontend && test -f package.json && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd apps/backend && test -f package.json && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && env ENV=DEV npm run dev:backend && env ENV=DEV npm run dev:frontend
